name: static
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
